org.synyx.mojo.opencms.helper

Class FilescanDirectoryWalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker
      • org.synyx.mojo.opencms.helper.FilescanDirectoryWalker

  • public class FilescanDirectoryWalker
extends org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker
    This DirectoryWalker collects all Files and Directories of a given Start-Directory. You can exclude certain directories by giving their exact names as a List.
    Author:
    macmac

        protected boolean handleDirectory(File directory,
                      int depth,
                      Collection results)
        Decides wether to step into a directory or not and adds the directory to the results if it does not match any excludes.
        Overrides:

        depth - depth (ignored)
        results - Collection holding the results of the scan
        Returns:
